name: Shoots McBoom
description:
This is a game about a default capsule rotated around the x-axis at a 90-degree angle (just as God intended) running around a castle and blasting at goobers with up to 5 different weapons. Try to collect all the items, find the secrets, and defeat all the guys for the best score.

This is what I would consider a "minimum viable product" for a free FPS designed to showcase what I've been learning in Godot and is by no means "finished". If it comes to pass, I want to develop on the presentation of the game with audio (including VA) and better weapon animations.

Tools Used:

Godot - Game Engine

Aseprite - Textures

Blender - Modeling
